trans-unit.source: Node version managers allow you to install and switch between multiple versions of Node.js and npm on your system so you can test your applications on multiple versions of npm to ensure they work for users on different versions.

trans-unit.source: Node.js and npm have very specific definitions of packages and modules, which are easy to mix up. We'll discuss those definitions here, make them distinct, and explain why certain default files are named the way they are.
trans-unit.target: Node.js和npm对包和模块有非常具体的定义,这很容易混淆。我们将在这里讨论这些定义,使它们与众不同,并解释为什么某些默认文件的命名方式。

trans-unit.source: Node.js has lots of versions, and its development is very active. As a good practice to manage the various versions, we recommend that you use a version manager for your Node.js installation. There are many great options, here are a few:
trans-unit.target: Node.js有很多版本,而且它的开发非常活跃。作为管理各种版本的良好实践,我们建议你在安装Node.js时使用版本管理器。有很多不错的选择,下面是几个。

trans-unit.source: Note that package-name is taken from package.json, not from directory name.

trans-unit.target: 请注意，除非本地 .gitignore 或 .npmignore 文件将其忽略，否则将包括该目录中的所有内容。要了解如何使用这些命令，请参阅 npm-developers 。

trans-unit.source: Note that git requires you to have set up GPG keys in your git configs for this to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,git 要求你在 git 配置中设置了 GPG 密钥,这样才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the @ symbol is omitted, in either case, npm will instead attempt to install from GitHub; see npm install.

trans-unit.source: Note that in this case, you are referring to the directory name, node-redis, rather than the package name redis.

trans-unit.source: Note that most version ranges must be put in quotes so that your shell will treat it as a single argument.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,大多数版本范围必须放在引号中,这样你的shell就会把它当作一个单一的参数。

trans-unit.source: Note that pretty much everything in that folder will be exposed by default. So, if you have secret stuff in there, use a .npmignore file to list out the globs to ignore, or publish from a fresh checkout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，默认情况下该文件夹中的几乎所有内容都将公开。因此，如果其中包含秘密内容，请使用 .npmignore 文件列出要忽略的glob，或从新的结帐中发布。

trans-unit.source: Note that read-only defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，只读默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Note that read-only is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，只读设置为true。

trans-unit.source: Note that starting lines with - and + also should be prefixed with a semicolon, but this is much less common.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，带有 - 和 + 的起始行也应以分号作为前缀，但这很少见。

trans-unit.source: Note that the "restart" script is run in addition to the "stop" and "start" scripts, not instead of them.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除了 “停止”和“启动”脚本外，还会运行“重新启动”脚本，而不是代替它们。

trans-unit.source: Note that the package is not automatically rebuilt afterwards, so be sure to use npm rebuild <pkg> if you make any changes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该软件包之后不会自动重建，因此，如果进行任何更改，请确保使用 npm rebuild <pkg> 。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is only one level of access. Either you can modify a package, or you can't. Future versions may contain more fine-grained access levels, but that is not implemented at this time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只有一个级别的权限。要么你可以修改一个包,要么你不能。未来的版本可能会包含更多细化的访问级别,但目前还没有实现。

trans-unit.source: Note that these script files don't have to be nodejs or even javascript programs. They just have to be some kind of executable file.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这些脚本文件不一定是nodejs甚至javascript程序。它们只需要是某种可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this behavior can be suppressed (treating all prerelease versions as if they were normal versions, for the purpose of range matching) by setting the includePrerelease flag on the options object to any functions that do range matching.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过将options对象上的 includePrerelease 标志设置为任何进行范围匹配的函数，来抑制此行为（将所有预发布版本视为正常版本，以进行范围匹配）。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is only necessary for globally-installed packages. Local installs are completely contained within a project's node_modules folder. Delete that folder, and everything is gone (unless a package's install script is particularly ill-behaved).

trans-unit.source: Note that this is only necessary for globally-installed packages. Local installs are completely contained within a project's node_modules folder. Delete that folder, and everything is gone less a package's install script is particularly ill-behaved).

trans-unit.source: Note that this means that local installs can cause things to be installed into the global space at the same time. The link is only done if one of the two conditions are met:

trans-unit.source: Note that this only applies to the root of the project that you're running npm in. It has no effect when your module is published. For example, you can't publish a module that forces itself to install globally, or in a different location.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这只适用于你运行npm的项目根目录。当你的模块被发布时,它没有任何影响。例如,你不能发布一个强制全局安装或在不同位置安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: Note that this operation transforms the dependency tree, but will never result in new modules being installed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个操作会改变依赖树,但不会导致新模块的安装。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must be the package owner to deprecate something. See the owner and adduser help topics.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您必须是程序包所有者才能弃用某些内容。请参阅 owner 和 adduser 帮助主题。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must have a default GPG key set up in your git config for this to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,你必须在 git 配置中设置一个默认的 GPG 密钥才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Note that, since ranges may be non-contiguous, a version might not be greater than a range, less than a range, or satisfy a range! For example, the range 1.2 <1.2.9 || >2.0.0 would have a hole from 1.2.9 until 2.0.0, so the version 1.2.10 would not be greater than the range (because 2.0.1 satisfies, which is higher), nor less than the range (since 1.2.8 satisfies, which is lower), and it also does not satisfy the range.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于范围可能是不连续的，因此版本可能不会大于范围，小于范围或满足范围！例如，范围 1.2 <1.2.9 || >2.0.0 会有一个从 1.2.9 到 2.0.0 的孔，因此版本 1.2.10 不会大于范围（因为 2.0.1 满足，即较高），也不会小于范围（因为 1.2.8 满足（较低），并且也不满足该范围。

trans-unit.source: Note: Even if you delete the .npmrc file, it'll be kept in the commit history - to clean your secret up entirely make sure to squash them.
trans-unit.target: 注意：即使删除 .npmrc 文件，该文件也将保留在提交历史记录中-要彻底清除秘密，请确保将其压扁。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you introduce a change that breaks a package dependency, we strongly recommend incrementing the version major number; see below for details.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, two separate npm install will create package locks that cause merge conflicts in source control systems. As of npm@5.7.0, these conflicts can be resolved by manually fixing any package.json conflicts, and then running npm install [--package-lock-only] again. npm will automatically resolve any conflicts for you and write a merged package lock that includes all the dependencies from both branches in a reasonable tree. If --package-lock-only is provided, it will do this without also modifying your local node_modules/.
trans-unit.target: 有时，两个单独的npm安装会创建软件包锁，这些软件包锁会导致源代码控制系统中的合并冲突。从 npm@5.7.0 开始，可以通过手动解决任何 package.json 冲突，然后再次运行 npm install [--package-lock-only] 来解决这些冲突。 npm将自动为您解决任何冲突，并在合理的树中编写合并的软件包锁，其中包括来自两个分支的所有依赖项。如果提供了 --package-lock-only ，它将在不修改本地 node_modules/ 情况下执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: One key detail about package-lock.json is that it cannot be published, and it will be ignored if found in any place other than the toplevel package. It shares a format with npm-shrinkwrap.json, which is essentially the same file, but allows publication. This is not recommended unless deploying a CLI tool or otherwise using the publication process for producing production packages.
trans-unit.target: 关于 package-lock.json 的一个关键细节是它无法发布，并且如果在顶级软件包之外的任何地方都将被忽略。它与npm-shrinkwrap.json共享一种格式，该格式本质上是同一文件，但是可以发布。除非部署CLI工具或以其他方式使用发布过程来生产生产软件包，否则不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: One key detail about package-lock.json is that it cannot be published, and it will be ignored if found in any place other than the toplevel package. It shares a format with npm-shrinkwrap.json, which is essentially the same file, but allows publication. This is not recommended unless deploying a CLI tool or otherwise using the publication process for producing production packages.
trans-unit.target: 关于 package-lock.json 的一个关键细节是它无法发布，并且如果在顶级软件包之外的任何地方都将被忽略。它与npm-shrinkwrap.json共享一种格式，该格式本质上是相同的文件，但允许发布。除非部署CLI工具或使用发布过程来生产生产软件包，否则不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: Publishing sensitive information to the registry can harm your users, compromise your development infrastructure, be expensive to fix, and put you at risk of legal action. We strongly recommend removing sensitive information, such as private keys, passwords, personally identifiable information (PII), and credit card data before publishing your package to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将敏感信息发布到注册表可能会损害您的用户，损害您的开发基础结构，修复成本高昂，并使您面临法律诉讼的风险。我们强烈建议您在将程序包发布到注册表之前，删除敏感信息，例如私钥，密码，个人身份信息（PII）和信用卡数据。

trans-unit.source: Publishing sensitive information to the registry can harm your users, compromise your development infrastructure, be expensive to fix, and put you at risk of legal action. We strongly recommend removing sensitive information, such as private keys, passwords, [personally identifiable information][pii] (PII), and credit card data before publishing your package to the registry. Even if your package is private, sensitive information can be exposed if the package is made public or downloaded to a computer that can be accessed by more users than intended.
trans-unit.target: 将敏感信息发布到注册表可能会损害您的用户，损害您的开发基础结构，修复成本高昂，并使您面临法律诉讼的风险。我们强烈建议您在将程序包发布到注册表之前，删除敏感信息，例如私钥，密码，[个人身份信息] [pii]（PII）和信用卡数据。即使您的软件包是私有的，但如果将该软件包公开或下载到可供更多用户访问的计算机上，则可能会暴露敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: Scope is optional and follows the usual rules for scope.

trans-unit.source: Scoped package
trans-unit.target: 范围内的包装

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages
trans-unit.target: 范围内的包装

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages default to restricted, but you can either publish them as public using npm publish --access=public, or set their access as public using npm access public after the initial publish.
trans-unit.target: 作用域程序包默认为受限包，但您可以使用 npm publish --access=public 将它们公开发布，也可以在初始发布后使用 npm access public 将它们设置为公开访问。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages are installed the same way, except they are grouped together in a sub-folder of the relevant node_modules folder with the name of that scope prefix by the @ symbol, e.g. npm install @myorg/package would place the package in {prefix}/node_modules/@myorg/package. See scope for more details.
trans-unit.target: 有作用域的软件包以相同的方式安装，不同之处在于它们在相关的 node_modules 文件夹的子文件夹中分组在一起，该子文件夹的作用域名称以@符号表示，例如 npm install @myorg/package 会将软件包放置在 {prefix}/node_modules/@myorg/package 。有关更多详细信息，请参见 scope 。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages are installed the same way, except they are grouped together in a sub-folder of the relevant node_modules folder with the name of that scope prefix by the @ symbol, e.g. npm install @myorg/package would place the package in {prefix}/node_modules/@myorg/package. See scope for more details.
trans-unit.target: 有作用域的软件包以相同的方式安装，不同之处在于它们在相关的 node_modules 文件夹的子文件夹中分组在一起，该子文件夹的作用域名称以@符号表示，例如 npm install @myorg/package 会将软件包放置在 {prefix}/node_modules/@myorg/package 。有关更多详细信息，请参见 scope 。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages are installed to a sub-folder of the regular installation folder, e.g. if your other packages are installed in node_modules/packagename, scoped modules will be installed in node_modules/@myorg/packagename. The scope folder (@myorg) is simply the name of the scope preceded by an @ symbol, and can contain any number of scoped packages.
trans-unit.target: 作用域软件包将安装到常规安装文件夹的子文件夹中，例如，如果其他软件包安装在 node_modules/packagename 中，则作用域模块将安装在 node_modules/@myorg/packagename 。作用域文件夹（ @myorg ）只是作用域的名称，其前面带有 @ 符号，并且可以包含任意数量的作用域软件包。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages are private by default; you must pass a command-line flag when publishing to make them public.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下,作用域包是私有的;你必须在发布时传递一个命令行标志来使它们公开。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages can be published and installed as of npm@2 and are supported by the primary npm registry. Unscoped packages can depend on scoped packages and vice versa. The npm client is backwards-compatible with unscoped registries, so it can be used to work with scoped and unscoped registries at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 有作用域的软件包可以从 npm@2 发布和安装，并且受主要npm注册表支持。无作用域的程序包可以取决于作用域程序包，反之亦然。npm客户端与无作用域的注册表向后兼容，因此它可以用于同时作用域和无作用域的注册表。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages can be published from the CLI as of npm@2 and can be published to any registry that supports them, including the primary npm registry.
trans-unit.target: 可以从 npm@2 从CLI发布作用域包，并且可以将其发布到支持它们的任何注册表中，包括主要npm注册表。

trans-unit.source: Scoped packages.
trans-unit.target: 范围内的包。

trans-unit.source: Scopes and package visibility
trans-unit.target: 范围和包件透明度

trans-unit.source: Scopes are a way of grouping related packages together, and also affect a few things about the way npm treats the package.
trans-unit.target: 作用域是一种将相关包分组的方式,也会影响到npm处理包的一些方式。

trans-unit.source: Scopes are used to group related packages together, and to create a namespace, like a domain, for npm modules. This is explained in more detail here.
trans-unit.target: 范围用于将相关的软件包组合在一起，并为npm模块创建名称空间（如域）。这将在此处更详细地说明。

trans-unit.source: Scopes can be associated with a separate registry. This allows you to seamlessly use a mix of packages from the primary npm registry and one or more private registries, such as npm Enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 作用域可以与一个单独的注册表关联。这让您可以无缝地使用主 npm 注册表和一个或多个私有注册表(如 npm Enterprise)中的包。

trans-unit.source: Scopes have a many-to-one relationship with registries: one registry can host multiple scopes, but a scope only ever points to one registry.
trans-unit.target: 作用域与注册表有多对一的关系:一个注册表可以托管多个作用域,但一个作用域永远只指向一个注册表。

trans-unit.source: Scripts
trans-unit.target: Scripts

trans-unit.source: Scripts are run by passing the line as a script argument to sh.
trans-unit.target: 通过将行作为脚本参数传递给 sh 来运行脚本。

trans-unit.source: Scripts are run from the root of the module, regardless of what your current working directory is when you call npm run. If you want your script to use different behavior based on what subdirectory you're in, you can use the INIT_CWD environment variable, which holds the full path you were in when you ran npm run.
trans-unit.target: 脚本从模块的根目录运行，而不管调用 npm run 时当前的工作目录是什么。如果您希望脚本根据所处的子目录使用不同的行为，则可以使用 INIT_CWD 环境变量，该变量保存了您运行 npm run 时的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Second, a user who has opted into using a prerelease version has clearly indicated the intent to use that specific set of alpha/beta/rc versions. By including a prerelease tag in the range, the user is indicating that they are aware of the risk. However, it is still not appropriate to assume that they have opted into taking a similar risk on the next set of prerelease versions.
trans-unit.target: 其次，选择使用预发行版本的用户清楚地表明了使用该特定的alpha / beta / rc版本集的意图。通过在该范围中包含预发布标签，用户表示他们已经意识到风险。但是，仍然不适合假定他们选择对下一组预发行版本承担类似的风险。

trans-unit.source: Since npm@1.1.71, the npm CLI has run the prepublish script for both npm publish and npm install, because it's a convenient way to prepare a package for use (some common use cases are described in the section below). It has also turned out to be, in practice, very confusing. As of npm@4.0.0, a new event has been introduced, prepare, that preserves this existing behavior. A new event, prepublishOnly has been added as a transitional strategy to allow users to avoid the confusing behavior of existing npm versions and only run on npm publish (for instance, running the tests one last time to ensure they're in good shape).
trans-unit.target: 从 npm@1.1.71 开始，npm CLI 为 npm publish 和 npm install 都运行了 prepublish 脚本，因为这是准备要使用的软件包的便捷方法（以下部分介绍了一些常用的用例）。在实践中，这也令人非常困惑。从 npm@4.0.0 开始，引入了一个新事件 prepare ，保留了此现有行为。一个新的事件， prepublishOnly 已作为一个过渡性的策略，让用户避免现有NPM版本的混淆行为，只有在运行 npm publish （例如，最后一次运行测试以确保其状态良好）。

trans-unit.source: Since continuous deployment environments usually involve the creation of a deploy artifact, you may wish to create an automation token on the website. This will allow you to publish even if you have two-factor authentication enabled on your account.
trans-unit.target: 由于连续部署环境通常涉及创建部署工件，因此您可能希望在网站上创建自动化令牌。即使您在帐户上启用了双重身份验证，这也将允许您进行发布。

trans-unit.source: Since npm and node.js products are managed by different entities, updates and maintenance can become complex. Also, the Node.js installation process installs npm in a directory that only has local permissions. This can cause permissions errors when you attempt to run packages globally.
trans-unit.target: 由于npm和node.js产品由不同的实体管理,更新和维护可能会变得复杂。另外,Node.js安装过程会将npm安装在一个只有本地权限的目录中。当你试图全局运行包时,这可能会导致权限错误。

trans-unit.source: Start with 1.0.0

Starting at the $PWD, npm will walk up the folder tree checking for a folder that contains either a package.json file, or a node_modules folder. If such a thing is found, then that is treated as the effective "current directory" for the purpose of running npm commands. (This behavior is inspired by and similar to git's .git-folder seeking logic when running git commands in a working dir.)
trans-unit.target: 从$ PWD开始，npm将沿着文件夹树移动，检查包含 package.json 文件或 node_modules 文件夹的文件夹。如果找到这样的东西，则出于运行npm命令的目的，将其视为有效的“当前目录”。（此行为是受工作目录中运行git命令时git的.git-folder寻找逻辑的启发和相似。）

The actual shell referred to by /bin/sh also depends on the system. As of npm@5.1.0 you can customize the shell with the script-shell configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您的脚本在其中运行的实际外壳取决于平台。默认情况下，在类似Unix的系统上，它是 /bin/sh 命令，在Windows上是 cmd.exe 。 /bin/sh 引用的实际shell 也取决于系统。从 npm@5.1.0 开始,您可以使用 script-shell 配置自定义shell。

trans-unit.source: The arguments will only be passed to the script specified after npm run and not to any pre or post script.

trans-unit.source: The audit command submits a description of the dependencies configured in your project to your default registry and asks for a report of known vulnerabilities. The report returned includes instructions on how to act on this information.
trans-unit.target: 审核命令向默认注册表提交项目中配置的依赖关系的描述,并要求提供已知漏洞的报告。返回的报告包括如何根据这些信息采取行动的说明。

trans-unit.source: The audit command submits a description of the dependencies configured in your project to your default registry and asks for a report of known vulnerabilities. The report returned includes instructions on how to act on this information. The command will exit with a 0 exit code if no vulnerabilities were found.
trans-unit.target: 审核命令将项目中配置的依赖关系的描述提交给默认注册表,并要求提供已知漏洞的报告。返回的报告包括如何根据这些信息采取行动的说明。如果没有发现漏洞,该命令将以 0 退出代码退出。
